ðŸ”¹ Smash & Run in Open Space for the Win! ðŸ”¹

Jump and shoot the asteroids, but watch out for the rocks! 

* Do you like Subway Surfers?
* What about Smash Hit?

If yes, then you will love this game!

* Smash Runner new idea is just here!
* The new VR gameplay is definitely here to shake things up! 

This game requires focus, concentration and timing, not only to travel through space as much as you can, but also to earn rewards for every asteroid hit. 

Beware of rocks - move left, right, jump or crouch to avoid the Clash!

ðŸ”¹ Challenge Yourself & Have Fun! ðŸ”¹

Play, relax and exercise while traveling in space.

changelog.change_log: Major fix of not working levels generator after previous update of base logic.

What is new:
 -> Levels 11-20 (Double obstacles) now available both for Easy and Medium difficulty. 
 -> Additional explanations added to tutorial level. 
 -> Added infinite level for cosmos theme - see how far you can reach.

What was fixed:
 -> Fixed disappearing lives after end of level.
 -> Fixed jump disabling at certain times.
 -> Fixed fireball collection points animation in cosmos levels
 -> Fixed disappearing points from metorite hits at certain times.

What is comming:
 -> Hard difficulty!
 -> Levels 21-30!
 -> Desert levels!!!

BIG UPDATE:

What's new:
- Level system implemented.
- Easy and Medium difficulty added.
- Current level converted to tutorial level with no lives and infinite gameplay.
- New cosmos elements added to Cosmos level
- Level finish.
- Starring system introduced with stars 1-5 depending on score.
- Level PAUSE.


Fixes:
- Rays in menu level become invisible - fixed.

What's new:
 - Added lives to the game! Now making mistakes isn't as bad as it was before because 3 suns fix 1 lost life! Now you can learn to play the game without dying immediately.

What was fixed:
 - Automatic deactivation of jumping -> Fixed!

What to expect soon:
 - Tutorial levels for jumping and shooting.
 - Difficulty choice - Easy and Medium.
 - Play style customizations:
	- You will be able to play with buttons instead of real life jumps and movement!
 - Many more to come!

New fun features keep on coming...

This new version brings to the game:
- Sun collection as rewards for going through the rain of asteroids like a true Smash Runner and choosing the more difficult but always rewarding path there is.
- More VFX:
  - Fire circles when collecting a sun,
  - Reward display when collecting a sun,
  - Parts of a fire circle on asteroid collision to display from which direction the player was hit from.
- Lables on map choice menu to improve clarity.


Fixes from previous release:
- Passing through some obstacles - Fixed!
- Dying of unknown collisions - Fixed!
- Random double jump - Fixed!
